1.text: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.

5.text: Your hands fashioned and made me, and now you have made me altogether.

13.text: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.

20.text: I will give thanks to you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Wonderful are your works; my soul knows it very well.

24.text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights.

27.text: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven: a time to be born.

37.text: When a woman is giving birth, she has sorrow because her hour has come, but when she has delivered the baby, she no longer remembers the anguish, for joy that a human being has been born into the world.

40.text: Behold, children are a heritage from the Lord, the fruit of the womb a reward.
